name: PowerDriftExtreme: Drift-O-Mania 3000!
description:
It's a racing game where you can only turn clockwise.

Two different maps. 5-lap races. Play it with your gamejam team!

Made using Godot, Aseprite and some other stuff.

Playable fullscreen here: https://drift.pyjam.as

Creators:
Rasmus Malver - Programming and Art
Vincent Olesen - Programming
Emil Norsker - Programming
Linus Hjalsted - Level Design
Asbjørn Olling - Programming
